sentences.en: By adding this concept to our cognitive toolkit, Rushkoff argues, we will have a better chance of using technologies “consciously and purposefully” and of resisting that bias.
sentences.cn: 洛西科夫认为，意识到这种偏见的存在之后，人们将来更有可能“有意识有目的地”运用技术并抑制偏见。

sentences.en: Chelsea actually invited this ball purposefully, so confident were they that they could deal with it.
sentences.cn: 切尔西其实是有目的地引诱这种传球的, 他们是如此的自信可以好好应付它.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Add elements on the face purposefully, be cool.
sentences.cn: 总结: 在基本的脸型上有目的地添加, 就能有丰富表现.

sentences.en: He strode purposefully into the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他迈着坚定的步伐走进会场.

sentences.en: He strode purposefully towards the barn.
sentences.cn: 他毅然大步朝粮仓走去。

sentences.en: It is morally ambiguous and purposefully divorced from the thrill - seeking flamboyance of the director's glory - glory days.
sentences.cn: 该片在道义上是暧昧不清的,并且刻意背离这名导演在其以荣耀为主题的鼎盛时期的那种追求刺激的华丽风格.

sentences.en: Purposefully applying lexical chunks into writing can better students writing skills step by step.
sentences.cn: 学生有意识地将语块用于写作中,写作能力能逐步提高.

sentences.en: She strode purposefully towards the door.
sentences.cn: 她坚定地大步走向门口.

sentences.en: She strode purposefully up to the door and knocked loudly.
sentences.cn: 她故意地大步走到门前,并大声敲门.

sentences.en: There should also be time to read the Writing Task material carefully purposefully.
sentences.cn: 你也应该仔细有目的地阅读写作材料.

sentences.en: They have been purposefully perforated, presumably to be strung together.
sentences.cn: 而且还被有目的的穿孔了, 据推测是为了把它们穿起来.

sentences.en: They moved purposefully through the milling crowd.
sentences.cn: 他们穿过乱哄哄的人群时目的明确，行动坚决。

sentences.en: They purposefully increased their debt relative to the value of their assets.
sentences.cn: 房主有意根据资产价值调整自己的负债额.

sentences.en: They purposefully keep people misinformed and fearful through their control of the media.
sentences.cn: 他们有目的地通过所控制的媒体来误导和恐吓民众。

sentences.en: Under the present conditions, ideological and political work should be done more purposefully, effectivelly and initiatively.
sentences.cn: 这就要求思想政治工作要进一步加强和改进,特别是要在加强针对性、效性 、 动性,增强时代感上下工夫.

sentences.en: We watched the little boy toddle up purposefully to the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 我们看著那小男孩特意晃到冰箱前.
